name: First Time
text: Feed your first Karma Tree.

name: Hungry
text: Finish a Loop level with every single fruit eaten by you or your teammates.

name: Whale Pile
text: Jump on a whale's water platform while being a whale yourself

name: Collector
text: End a Zoo Loop with 3 Karma Gifts collected by you or your team.

name: Savior
text: Save a teammate's Halo from popping at the very last second.

name: Kisser's Delight
text: Send & receive a Karma Kiss to and from the same other player.

name: Explorer
text: Find a secret statue in your Sanctuary.

name: Danger Dancer
text: Complete a dance in a naughty eye's reach.

name: Indecisive
text: Change your mind more than 5 times during the bonus vote.

name: Bookworm
text: Possess and read every tip in the Sanctuary's Library.

name: Dreamer
text: Visit the telescope for the first time.

name: The Pasta
text: Reach and feed the Karma Tree with the game's language being 'Pasta'.

name: Star Spotter
text: Reveal 10 Stars.

name: Astronomer
text: Reveal 20 Stars.

name: Stargazer
text: Have 10 Stars shining.

name: Super Star
text: Have 20 Stars shining.

name: Cosmonaut
text: Enlighten 20 planets.

name: Astronaut
text: Enlighten 40 planets.

name: Eye in the sky
text: Be the one to trigger the explosion of a naughty eye.

name: Looter
text: Complete a Treasure Room level with all the fruit collected.

name: Dusty
text: Reach an exit portal while under the sandstorm.

name: Be Water my friend
text: Water a teammate's active Flowerpot while playing as the Watering Can.
